title: never would have thought it- chapter 1
body:
why katarina is weak; because she depends only on her burst, if she uses all her cooldowns and doesn't kill her target, her target can quickly retaliate and can easily destroy her, also she has no cc and only one way to escape from cc, so if you can predict when she'll go in you stun her easily when she uses all her cooldowns. 

thoughts?

replies.body: Sounds like the tl;dr of any assassin to me. Except Ekko, because he's bs
Only a dumb kat would all in someone that wouldn't die from her combo.
yes, but thats why she does 10 billion damage once she gets any Large Rod item.
